ygData.subject: Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: I m at Level 12 swinging a FS Scimitar. Also have a Gnoll Hide Lariat for those that require magic hits. Today I saw a lower-level Druid smacking for more
ygData.messageBody:
I'm at Level 12 swinging a FS Scimitar. Also have
a Gnoll Hide Lariat for those that require magic
hits. Today I saw a lower-level Druid smacking for more
damage than I was. I've only been playing for about 2
months and am not all that wise in the ways of EQ and
Rangerism. Point is what should I carry for a 1h slashing?
If you have suggestions please tell me where to find
or purchase it. I currently have about
40pp<br><br>Xanthar<br>Ranger of Tunare<br>Drinal
